question: What does one penguin say to another penguin?
response: I love you like no one else

question: The one who makes it doesn't want it; the one who buys it doesn't use it; the one who uses it doesn't know it. What is it?
It can run but never walk, it has a mouth but never talks. What is it?
It has keys but cannot open locks. What is it?
It goes up and down but never moves. What is it?
I am a 7-letter word, if you say me, I take your breath away. If you add one more letter, I seem quite cold, but if you remove one, I become essential. What am I?
It enters the house through the window but never leaves through the door. What is it?
I am always in front of you, but you can never see me. What am I?
You can never keep me until you give me. What am I?
I am a symbol that always follows R but never T. What am I?
The more you take away from me, the bigger I get. What am I?
I have cities but no buildings. I have forests but no trees. I have rivers but no water. What am I?
It has keys but cannot open any door. Sometimes it has numbers but never does calculations. What is it?
I am a place where everyone runs but no one moves. I am always full but never crowded. What am I?
I am the beginning of wisdom, the end of life, and the middle of darkness. What am I?
I am a number that is always in the middle of 5 and 9. What am I?
I am a 12-letter word, but if you say me, you will have one of the 12 parts. If you write me, you will have all 12. What am I?
I have eyes but never cry. I have a heart but never love. What am I?
I am a hole you can fill with objects, but if you fill me with water, I disappear. What am I?
I have a neck but no head, and I accompany you in bed every night. What am I?
I am a place where people go when they are broken, but I never need to be repaired. What am I?
I have leaves but I am not a tree. I have a face but I am not a person. What am I?
I am a path you can walk, but you are always going backward. What am I?
You can never touch it, but it is always in front of you. What is it?
I have an eye but cannot see. What am I?
I am always in the water but never get wet. What am I?
I can fly without wings, I am always close to the ground, but I never fall. What am I?
I am round like a coin but have no value. What am I?
I am a 5-letter word and feared more than death. If you remove the first letter, you will have a place where people live. What am I?
I am a place where you can never enter, but you can always see what is inside. What am I?
I have teeth but cannot chew. What am I?
I am a hole in the water that you can fill with a cup. What am I?
I have a head, a body, but no soul. What am I?
I have hands and a face but no body. What am I?
I am something that is more useful when broken. What am I?
I am a place where you can find treasures and books, but you will never find gold or words. What am I?
If you name me, you break me. What am I?
I am a number without end, but I always start with 1. What am I?

I am in everything and in nothing. What am I?
You continue on red but stop on green. What am I?

What is always in front of you but cannot be seen?

response: Because they are playing with other people

question: How many 9s are there between 1 and 100?
They are two fans that never stop during the day, but when you sleep, they stop and stay still. What are they?

If an electric train is going from North to South, which way does the smoke go?
response: It doesn't produce smoke; it's electric

question: It has 4 letters, starts with C, ends with O, and is on the back. What is it?

People buy me to eat, but they never eat me. What am I?
We kill and encourage; you decide if we are poison or sweet. What are we?

response: It's better to use a spoon
